sn3.25:4.13: _Bhūmigata_ and _vehāsaṭṭha_ are stock in this phrase. They are explained in Pj2 as “underground” (assuming that _bhūmigata_ and _bhūmatta_ are synonyms) and “above the ground”. _Upalāpetuṁ_ is a means by which Vassakāra suggests the Vajjis can be overcome ([dn16:1.5.8](), [an7.22:12.3]()).
